amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for legislation that reforms and strengthens elementary and secondary education.

vote.text: Amendment SA 697 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S1873-1874; text: CR S1873) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for legislation that reforms and strengthens elementary and secondary education.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 697 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Murray.
